user.title: Quatt pairing
user.description: Enter your CIC serial. You can find it in the Quatt app under Settings → Device → Controller (CIC). Example: CIC-xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

pair.title: Confirm on the CIC
pair.description: Press the physical button on the CIC within 2 minutes to confirm pairing.

error.pair_failed: Timed out waiting for CIC confirmation
